summary: My modification of Serana, requires Apachii Sky Hair. Removes her necromany and replaces her hair.
descriptionHtml:
My modification of Serana, requires Apachii Sky Hair. Removes her necromany and replaces her hair.

You may get the dark face bug with this. I'm really loading this in to Nexus as an easy way to share it between my systems. I will probably not try to fix the dark face bug as I have tried before with my other mod but failed and it's just easier to fix it in the CK once you download the mod. Sorry for the inconvenience. Again, I'm really more sharing this with myself as I now have 2 laptops and a desktop that I use for Skyrim, but I thought I would throw it up on Nexus in case anyone else might be interested. Feel free to use the mod as you see fit.
author: jkemmery
